Computer Science.1: Demonstrate mastery of the mathematical foundations and familiarity of the scientific foundations of Computer Science.
Computer Science.2: Demonstrate mastery of discrete mathematics, differential and integral calculus, probability/statistics, and linear algebra.
Computer Science.3: Demonstrate familiarity with the fundamentals of natural science in at least one field, such as chemistry, physics, or geology.
Computer Science.4: Demonstrate familiarity with advanced concepts in automata and/or algorithm design and analysis.
